comment: The GOAT. I'm already signed up for his 2110 class.
Professor Stacey is a very good professor although it may seem like a lot of work this class is overall a good class

Dr. Stacey is genuinely the best professor I've ever had. take this from someone who HATES the English subject as a whole. Yes, he is a tough grader, and you will work your a** off, but it will make you a much better writer and it will prepare you for even harder classes after your gen eds. He is very supportive, relatable, and calm/collected
Dr. Stacey's class was very tough, but taught me more about myself as a writer than any class I've had so far. Definitely a great professor, just make sure to do your work on time.
Took a partially online english on accident and Dr. Stacey's class is definitely one I would take again for anyone on the Marietta (or, frankly, Kennesaw) campus!

Dr. Stacey was incredible, he's seriously one of my favorite professors at KSU. He's very smart and passionate about what he teaches, and offers helpful feedback. There is a lot of work in this class but as long as you put effort into your work and turn your assignments in on time you should be fine. Extra credit is also possible and easy to get.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Stacey is passionate and thoroughly explains the learning material using slides, short videos, and class discussions. He is compassionate and cares for his students and their work. The workload is manageable, and he provides helpful feedback and is willing to assist you. He's also into manga and anime if that's your thing.

I enjoyed having Dr. Stacey as a professor. He made his lectures as interesting as one can make an english class. You can tell he cares about his students and is very understanding of student situations. Workload is minimal. Be prepared to get called on randomly however.

This professor gave some of the best feedback that I have ever received on my work. Alongside that, there are extra credit opportunities on the two big essays in the course AND a chance at remediation if your essay scored below a 90. There are weekly discussion posts but a lot of them are peer review, which helps you connect with your classmates!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I received some of the best feedback I have ever received in this class. The discussions and journals were easy, with the majority of discussions being group work. There is a lot of peer review in this class, so you're never lost on the quality of your work. There are  extra credit opportunities and the professor is very responsive through email :)
rating_tags: Tough grader--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: The coursework was rigorous. He has great lectures and always willing to assist his students at anytime. I love how much passion he has for teaching.

I took him for my poetry WRIT 3100. Not sure why that wasn't an option to select! 
Anyway, Dr. Stacey has got to be like top 3 for professors ever. I thought his class would be super easy-- it wasn't. I'll admit I had to lock in a bit. However, I have never learned more in a class. The work and prompts were reasonable and digestible. I recommend.

Dr. Stacey might be the best professor I have ever had. He's such a good professor, he explains things in a very clear way. And his assignments are not difficult. He offers extra credit on assignments for just dropping by the writing center which is great. He is so knowledgeable on so many different topics, it amazed me how much knowledge he had.

Dr. Stacey is a great teacher. He gave great lectures and helped everyone a lot throughout the essay writing process. He also was very flexible with any schedule conflicts I had. There were 2 essays and a presentation in the class. The class was difficult like every other English class, but he was always accessible. Overall, a very solid class.

Dr. Stacey is an incredible literature teacher and our course focused on speculative fiction. He explains ideas very well and really values his students' opinions. He expects alot from students and really pushes you to unpack ideas. Do not take his class if you aren't prepared to read AND do the work. Also, he loves manga and watches alot of anime.
Coming back to rate him even though I took his course over a year ago, because I still remember how great of a professor he was.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures

comment: I have really enjoyed this class. I normally am not a fan of literature classes but Prof. Stacey gives us interesting readings that aren't boring and hard to finish. We always have great in class discussions as well. He gives amazing feedback on written assignments. I recommend his class. Attendance isn't mandatory but you should pretend like it is
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback

comment: Dr Stacy's english 1102 class was one of the easiest classes of my semester. His class is very research based and group project and group work oriented, but as long as you follow the rubrics and turn things in on time you will be fine. He is a very good teacher and is very understanding as well and I definitely recommend taking him

Participation is really important in this class but he is also understanding if you can't make it here and there. Other than that, the course content is very average for a ENG 1101 class but he makes it a lot more enjoyable with his personality

Prof. Stacey was truly amazing. Very caring and wants everyone in his class to succeed. Put forth the effort and you will pass the class easily. There are weekly smaller assignments that can be used as grade boosters, and three large papers in the semester. Very highly recommend him if you are able to take him. 10/10.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Stacey is such an amazing professor. He thoroughly explains the content of the class and gives you a clear idea of the layouts of your papers. If you go to the writing center for your paper he will give you 4 extra points on your paper which really does make the difference from a B to an A.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Go to class and actually try doing the work and youll be fine. There are weekly discussion posts.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She's very supportive don't get me wrong, but get prepared to do a lot of reading and be placed to ask for numerous assignments. Be specific too since she does expect a lot of contexts.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: Professor Stacey is one of the best online professors I've had. I took this class as a free elective and I don't regret it one bit. There are weekly discussions and quizzes as well as 3 major projects. All the assignments are full of great information that makes your brain work. Professor Stacey is awesome, great communication. Highly recommended!!
